DOC.brief_summary: This study analyze tibio-femoral patellofemoral ( motion ) mechanic ( force ) participant normal knee total knee arthroplasty ( TKA ) use one two different ( TKA ) device Low Contract Stress ( LCS ) Posterior Stabilizing ( PS ) Rotating Platform ( RP ) Total Knee Arthroplasty ( TKA ) . All knee analyze use image matching technique convert two-dimensional ( 2D ) fluoroscopic image three-dimensional ( 3D ) image . In conjunction fluoroscopic analysis , electromyography ( EMG ) data , ground reaction force ( GRF ) data allow complete analysis knee joint . These result help orthopaedic community well understand knee motion improve test exist implant develop future implant enhance patient ' life .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients must least six month postoperative . 2 . Potential subject body weight less 250 lb . 3 . Candidates must AKS score > 70 postoperatively . 4 . Patients must passive flexion least 100 . 5 . Implanted group must either LCS PS RP TKA , anatomical patella , Sigma PS RP TKA ; normal knee group must normal knee . 6 . Must willing sign Informed Consent HIPAA form . 1 . Pregnant female . 2 . Subjects meet study requirement .
